channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A Fly Tipping problem has been found, 29th September
item.description:
Two garden waste bags containing leaves have similarly been sitting outside Bowyer House

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Phillipp Street, Hackney, London

item.title: 3rd? Request. Fly tipped fridge that has now gathered lots more since this photo was taken., 29th September
item.description:
This fridge has been at the j t of Witherston Wy & Wm Barefoot Dr for months. It had been reported before our local councillor had chased up the fridge/freezer problems on the estate. PLEASE deal with it and the other stuff that has now gathered there. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Partridge Green, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blendon Drive from 32 - 34 crab apple trees, 29th September

item.title: A customer called that she woke up to find someone has dumped a pile of rubbish in her front garden. She tried to move it close to her rubbish bin but the waste team refused to collect it. She is pissed with this attitude and seeking the help of the Council. The address is 10 BAYSTON ROAD, N16 7LT, 29th September
item.description:

item.title: Elsworthy road - junction with primrose hill road (cam lw2677) - left-hand sign, 29th September
item.description:
FYI The CCTV cameras show that some tree cutting may be required to ensure that the sign on the left-hand side of the carriageway remains visible to drivers. The location is the entrance to the prohibited route in Elsworthy Road, at its with Primrose Hill Rd. Please see a recent CCTV image of this location below:

item.description:
